mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no, c.user_no, c.amount, c.packing_status, c.item_no, i.name, i.price, i.discounted_price, i.item_img, i.amount as inventory FROM cart c JOIN item i ON c.item_no = i.item_no WHERE c.user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY c.cart_no;
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET amount=#{amount} WHERE user_no = #{user_no} and cart_no=#{cart_no};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cart_no = #{cart_no} and user_no = #{user_no}
